name: Luise Freese
bio: Azure & Power Platform Architect and Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP) based in Germany. Focused on building AI-enabled solutions that work beyond demos and survive real-world constraints. Known for making invisible work visible: unmeasured effort, emotional load, operational friction, and the hidden cost of quick wins.
methods: Design for longevity, not just demos
Build accessible apps that everyone can use
Model data responsibly with governance in mind
Implement AI solutions that respect human context
